price: Àwọn wọ̀nyí kò retí kiní kan bí kò ṣe igbe ẹyọ kan, tí kò níí ní ìdádúró.¹
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, igbe ẹyọ kan ló máa pa wọ́n run. Kò níí sí igbe mìíràn mọ́ lẹ́yìn rẹ̀ fun ìparun wọn. Ẹ̀ẹ̀ kan gbọ̀n-ọ́n ni ìparun wọn.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
